item.title: R Markdown Workshop
item.description: Learn how to use this lightweight markup language to compose reproducible reports in many formats: MS Word, PDF, R Notebooks, Web Pages, Slide Presentations, and more. This exerpience-based learning workshop will help you master literate coding techniques for a whole new level of productivity through reproducibility. The workshop will use the RStudio IDE to introduce and reinforce concepts. Gain practical knowledge intergrating analysis code chunks with your report analysis and prose.
